item.text: W

item.name: Political Trickery
item.text: Exchange control of target land you control and target land an opponent controls. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
item.flavorText: "Politics is a game—move a stone here, move a stone there—except sometimes the stones bleed." —Shauku, Endbringer

item.name: Polymorph
item.text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. Its controller reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a creature card. The player puts that card onto the battlefield, then shuffles all other cards revealed this way into his or her library.
item.flavorText: "Ahh Opposable digits"

item.name: Power Sink
item.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If he or she doesn't, that player taps all lands with mana abilities he or she controls and empties his or her mana pool.

item.name: Preferred Selection
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top two cards of your library. You may sacrifice Preferred Selection and pay {2}{G}{G}. If you do, put one of those cards into your hand. If you don't, put one of those cards on the bottom of your library.

item.name: Prismatic Boon
item.text: X target creatures gain protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "How ironic that the greatest forge of civilization is battle." —Mangara

item.name: Prismatic Circle
item.text: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) As Prismatic Circle enters the battlefield, choose a color. {1}: The next time a source of your choice of the chosen color would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

item.name: Prismatic Lace
item.text: Target permanent becomes the color or colors of your choice. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

item.name: Psychic Transfer
item.text: If the difference between your life total and target player's life total is 5 or less, exchange life totals with that player.
item.flavorText: "The memory of your existence will fade like the final stars of morning." —Kaervek

item.name: Purgatory
item.text: Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, exile that card. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {4} and 2 life. If you do, return a card exiled with Purgatory to the battlefield.

item.name: Purraj of Urborg
item.text: Purraj of Urborg has first strike as long as it's attacking. Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may pay {B}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Purraj of Urborg.

item.name: Pyric Salamander
item.text: {R}: Pyric Salamander gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Sacrifice Pyric Salamander at the beginning of the next end step.
item.flavorText: When you've been chased by a dragon, you run from every lizard. —Suq'Ata saying

item.name: Quirion Elves
item.text: As Quirion Elves enters the battlefield, choose a color. {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. {T}: Add one mana of the chosen color to your mana pool.

item.name: Radiant Essence
item.text: Radiant Essence gets +1/+2 as long as an opponent controls a black permanent.
item.flavorText: "Her beauty was the beauty of the Sun at midday, deadly to those who underestimated her strength." —Azeworai, "Kenechi's Dream"

item.name: Raging Spirit
item.text: {2}: Raging Spirit becomes colorless until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Its burning power is more elusive than shade on the Unyaro Plains, more perilous than the horn of a rhino." —Akin, seasoned askari

item.name: Rampant Growth
item.text: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: "I've never heard growth before." —Gowon, Femeref herder

item.name: Rashida Scalebane
item.text: {T}: Destroy target attacking or blocking Dragon. It can't be regenerated. You gain life equal to its power.
item.flavorText: It is not by the blood of dragons that Rashida measures victories, but by the sum of children who no longer wake from nightmares of scales and fire.

item.name: Ravenous Vampire
item.text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice a nonartifact creature. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Ravenous Vampire. If you don't, tap Ravenous Vampire.
item.flavorText: Eternal life brings eternal hunger.

item.name: Ray of Command
item.text: Untap target creature an opponent controls and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn. When you lose control of the creature, tap it.
item.flavorText: "Heel."

item.name: Razor Pendulum
item.text: At the beginning of each player's end step, if that player has 5 or less life, Razor Pendulum deals 2 damage to him or her.
item.flavorText: "Amazing thing, gravity. It seems to work every time." —Telim'Tor

item.name: Reality Ripple
item.text: Target artifact, creature, or land phases out. (While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist. It phases in before its controller untaps during his or her next untap step.)
item.flavorText: "Can you prepare for the unexpected? No, you cannot. You can prepare only to be surprised." —Teferi

item.name: Reckless Embermage
item.text: {1}{R}: Reckless Embermage deals 1 damage to target creature or player and 1 damage to itself.
item.flavorText: Many mages have been consumed by their work.

item.name: Reflect Damage
item.text: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage this turn, that damage is dealt to that source's controller instead.
item.flavorText: From you to me, so me to you. —Femeref children's taunt

item.name: Regeneration
item.text: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) {G}: Regenerate enchanted creature. (The next time that creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
item.flavorText: "Death is not a debt I am yet willing to pay." —Purraj of Urborg

item.name: Reign of Chaos
item.text: Choose one — Destroy target Plains and target white creature; or destroy target Island and target blue creature.
item.flavorText: "The Burning Isles are the home to a dozen lords who claim dominion. Jamuraa will look to only one leader: me." —Kaervek

item.name: Reign of Terror
item.text: Destroy all green creatures or all white creatures. They can't be regenerated. You lose 2 life for each creature put into a graveyard this way.
item.flavorText: "I don't know what takes them; they die around me without time to scream." —Scout Ekemet, final journal

item.name: Reparations
item.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell that targets you or a creature you control, you may draw a card.
item.flavorText: "Sorry I burned down your village. Here's some gold."

item.name: Restless Dead
item.text: {B}: Regenerate Restless Dead.
item.flavorText: The rich's heirs often thank them after death . . . but preferably not in person. —Suq'Ata epigram

item.name: Ritual of Steel
item.text: Enchant creature When Ritual of Steel enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep. Enchanted creature gets +0/+2.
item.flavorText: "Our soldiers are blessed with lizard scales as hard and cold as steel." —Sidar Jabari

item.name: Rock Basilisk
item.text: Whenever Rock Basilisk blocks or becomes blocked by a non-Wall creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.
item.flavorText: In the eastern reaches of Jamuraa are arrangements of massive stones. No one knows their origins—for certain.

item.name: Rocky Tar Pit
item.text: Rocky Tar Pit enters the battlefield tapped. {T}, Sacrifice Rocky Tar Pit: Search your library for a Swamp or Mountain card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

item.name: Roots of Life
item.text: As Roots of Life enters the battlefield, choose Islands or Swamps. Whenever a land of the chosen type an opponent controls becomes tapped, you gain 1 life.

item.name: Sabertooth Cobra
item.text: Whenever Sabertooth Cobra deals damage to a player, he or she gets a poison counter. That player gets another poison counter at the beginning of his or her next upkeep unless he or she pays {2} before that turn. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

item.name: Sacred Mesa
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Sacred Mesa unless you sacrifice a Pegasus. {1}{W}: Put a 1/1 white Pegasus creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: "Do not go there, do not go / unless you rise on wings, unless you walk on hooves." —"Song to the Sun," Femeref song

item.name: Sand Golem
item.text: When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Sand Golem, return Sand Golem from your graveyard to the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it at the beginning of the next end step.

item.name: Sandbar Crocodile
item.text: Phasing (This phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.)
item.flavorText: "We've run aground sandbars before, but today, a sandbar ran aground us." —Kipkemboi, Kukemssa pirate

item.name: Sandstorm
item.text: Sandstorm deals 1 damage to each attacking creature.
item.flavorText: Better to fight the sand for a few hours than to sleep beneath it forever. —Suq'Ata truism

item.name: Sapphire Charm
item.text: Choose one — Target player draws a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep; or target creature gains flying until end of turn; or target creature an opponent controls phases out. (While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist. It phases in before its controller untaps during his or her next untap step.)

item.name: Savage Twister
item.text: Savage Twister deals X damage to each creature.
item.flavorText: "Frozen, we watched the funnel pluck up three of the goats—pook pook pook—before we ran for the wadi." —Travelogue of Najat

item.name: Sawback Manticore
item.text: {4}: Sawback Manticore gains flying until end of turn. {1}: Sawback Manticore deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. Activate this ability only if Sawback Manticore is attacking or blocking and only once each turn.

item.name: Sea Scryer
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {1}, {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.

item.name: Sealed Fate
item.text: Look at the top X cards of target opponent's library. Exile one of those cards and put the rest back on top of that player's library in any order.
item.flavorText: It's good to know more about your enemy's fate than your enemy does.

item.name: Searing Spear Askari
item.text: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.) {1}{R}: Searing Spear Askari can't be blocked except by two or more creatures this turn.
item.flavorText: When the other soldiers of Zhalfir fall, the askaris will yet stand.

item.name: Seedling Charm
item.text: Choose one — Return target Aura attached to a creature to its owner's hand; or regenerate target green creature; or target creature gains trample until end of turn.

item.name: Seeds of Innocence
item.text: Destroy all artifacts. They can't be regenerated. The controller of each artifact destroyed this way gains life equal to its converted mana cost.
item.flavorText: "I have hidden from the machinations of Zhalfir for centuries. Why should I join your campaign?" —Jolrael

item.name: Serene Heart
item.text: Destroy all Auras.
item.flavorText: "If magic is your crutch, cast it aside and learn to walk without it." —Teferi

item.name: Sewer Rats
item.text: {B}, Pay 1 life: Sewer Rats gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability no more than three times each turn.
item.flavorText: You lie down with rats, and the rats run away. —Suq'Ata insult

item.name: Shadow Guildmage
item.text: {U}, {T}: Put target creature you control on top of its owner's library. {R}, {T}: Shadow Guildmage deals 1 damage to target creature or player and 1 damage to you.
item.flavorText: To keep the dead so others may live. —Shadow Guild maxim

item.name: Shadowbane
item.text: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you and/or creatures you control this turn, prevent that damage. If damage from a black source is prevented this way, you gain that much life.
item.flavorText: Light creates shadow; light destroys shadow. Such is the transience of darkness.

item.name: Shallow Grave
item.text: Return the top creature card of your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains haste until end of turn. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
item.flavorText: Good help is hard to dig up.

item.name: Shaper Guildmage
item.text: {W}, {T}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn. {B}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Shape this world in Zhalfir's image. —Shaper Guild maxim

item.name: Shauku, Endbringer
item.text: Flying Shauku, Endbringer can't attack if there's another creature on the battlefield. At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 3 life. {T}: Exile target creature and put a +1/+1 counter on Shauku.

item.name: Shauku's Minion
item.text: {B}{R}, {T}: Shauku's Minion deals 2 damage to target white creature.
item.flavorText: "My minions serve me in the light; I serve no one." —Shauku, Endbringer

item.name: Shimmer
item.text: As Shimmer enters the battlefield, choose a land type. Each land of the chosen type has phasing. (It phases in or out before its controller untaps during each of his or her untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.)
item.flavorText: To buy unseen land, pay in unseen coin. —Suq'Ata maxim

item.name: Sidar Jabari
item.text: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.) Whenever Sidar Jabari attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.
item.flavorText: "Prophecy is whatever one makes of it, but destiny cannot be changed." —Sidar Jabari

item.name: Sirocco
item.text: Target player reveals his or her hand. For each blue instant card revealed this way, that player discards that card unless he or she pays 4 life.
item.flavorText: "Blow, fiery wind, / strip illusion from the eye. / Blow, fiery wind of truth." —Femeref chant

item.name: Skulking Ghost
item.text: Flying When Skulking Ghost becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.
item.flavorText: "They exist only so long as the living take no notice." —Kifimbo, Shadow Guildmage

item.name: Sky Diamond
item.text: Sky Diamond enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.

item.name: Soar
item.text: You may cast Soar as though it had flash. If you cast it any time a sorcery couldn't have been cast, the controller of the permanent it becomes sacrifices it at the beginning of the next cleanup step. Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +0/+1 and has flying.
item.flavorText: "Would you give up your hands to fly? That is what the birds have done." —The One Thousand Questions

item.name: Soul Echo
item.text: Soul Echo enters the battlefield with X echo counters on it. You don't lose the game for having 0 or less life. At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Soul Echo if there are no echo counters on it. Otherwise, target opponent may choose that for each 1 damage that would be dealt to you until your next upkeep, you remove an echo counter from Soul Echo instead.

item.name: Soul Rend
item.text:
Destroy target creature if it's white. A creature destroyed this way can't be regenerated.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
item.flavorText: "Since I cannot stop death, I choose to stop life." —Kaervek

item.name: Soulshriek
item.text: Target creature you control gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard. Sacrifice that creature at the beginning of the next end step.
item.flavorText: "The flesh is a casket for the soul." —Shauku, Endbringer

item.name: Spatial Binding
item.text: Pay 1 life: Until your next upkeep, target permanent can't phase out.
item.flavorText: Time is the one shackle you can't break. —Zhalfirin aphorism

item.name: Spectral Guardian
item.text: Noncreature artifacts have shroud as long as Spectral Guardian is untapped. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)
item.flavorText: "A treasure to guard other treasures is worth the highest price." —Mtai, Civic Guildmage

item.name: Spirit of the Night
item.text: Flying, trample, haste, protection from black Spirit of the Night has first strike as long as it's attacking.

item.name: Spitting Earth
item.text: Spitting Earth deals damage equal to the number of Mountains you control to target creature.
item.flavorText: "There are times solid ground gives precious little comfort." —Talibah, embermage

item.name: Stalking Tiger
item.text: Stalking Tiger can't be blocked by more than one creature.
item.flavorText: In the Jamuraan jungles, there is often no separating beauty from danger.

item.name: Stone Rain
item.text: Destroy target land.
item.flavorText: "What rainbow could possibly come of this rain?" —Asmira, Holy Avenger

item.name: Stupor
item.text: Target opponent discards a card at random, then discards a card.
item.flavorText: There are medicines for all afflictions but idleness. —Suq'Ata saying

item.name: Subterranean Spirit
item.text: Protection from red {T}: Subterranean Spirit deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
item.flavorText: "Air hot with sulfur. / Earth heaves beneath me. / Could it be the mountain / ate something bad?" —Dwarven mining song

item.name: Sunweb
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Flying Sunweb can't block creatures with power 2 or less.
item.flavorText: "There is no sweeter music than the wails of a dying dragon." —Rashida Scalebane

item.name: Superior Numbers
item.text: Superior Numbers deals damage to target creature equal to the number of creatures you control in excess of the number of creatures target opponent controls.

item.name: Suq'Ata Firewalker
item.text: Suq'Ata Firewalker can't be the target of red spells or abilities from red sources. {T}: Suq'Ata Firewalker deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: "Comfortable even in a furnace? I've never met one who'd accept my wager." —Talibah, embermage

item.name: Swamp
item.text: B

item.name: Swamp
item.text: B

item.name: Swamp
item.text: B

item.name: Swamp
item.text: B

item.name: Tainted Specter
item.text: Flying {1}{B}{B}, {T}: Target player discards a card unless he or she puts a card from his or her hand on top of his or her library. If that player discards a card this way, Tainted Specter deals 1 damage to each creature and each player. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

item.name: Talruum Minotaur
item.text: Haste
item.flavorText: Don't insult a Talruum unless your mount is swift. —Suq'Ata saying

item.name: Taniwha
item.text: Trample Phasing (This phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.) At the beginning of your upkeep, all lands you control phase out. (They phase in before you untap during your next untap step.)
item.flavorText: "Taniwha rolls in its sleep, and the land is awash with the waves." —Poetics of Hanan

item.name: Teeka's Dragon
item.text: Flying; trample; rampage 4 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +4/+4 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)

item.name: Teferi's Curse
item.text: Enchant artifact or creature Enchanted permanent has phasing. (It phases in or out before its controller untaps during each of his or her untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.)
item.flavorText: "Stepping through time is like riding a camel. It may get you where you want to go, but the ride is rarely pleasant." —Teferi

item.name: Teferi's Drake
item.text: Flying Phasing (This phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.)
item.flavorText: "We threw dried fruit to the drakes that rode the air, streaming along the Weatherlight's side as we sailed amidst the clouds." —Sisay, Captain of the Weatherlight

item.name: Teferi's Imp
item.text: Flying Phasing (This phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.) Whenever Teferi's Imp phases out, discard a card. Whenever Teferi's Imp phases in, draw a card.
item.flavorText: Made you look.

item.name: Teferi's Isle
item.text: Phasing (This phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.) Teferi's Isle enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U}{U} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: The three wizards knew only that this isle held a great mystery—and that patience alone would solve it.

item.name: Telim'Tor
item.text: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.) Whenever Telim'Tor attacks, all attacking creatures with flanking get +1/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "The curious merely amass knowledge. The ambitious use it." —Telim'Tor

item.name: Telim'Tor's Darts
item.text: {2}, {T}: Telim'Tor's Darts deals 1 damage to target player.
item.flavorText: "People laughed at my darts—once." —Telim'Tor

item.name: Telim'Tor's Edict
item.text: Exile target permanent you own or control. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
item.flavorText: "Execution awaits the dissenter." —Kasib ibn Naji, Letters

item.name: Teremko Griffin
item.text: Flying; banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
item.flavorText: "When we're aloft, I love to lean over the Weatherlight's railing and watch the patterns the griffins' shadows make on the clouds below." —Sisay, Captain of the Weatherlight

item.name: Thirst
item.text: Enchant creature When Thirst enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Thirst unless you pay {U}.
item.flavorText: The first of the Thousand Deaths.

item.name: Tidal Wave
item.text: Put a 5/5 blue Wall creature token with defender onto the battlefield. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.
item.flavorText: When mountains ride the sea, waves live upon the fields.

item.name: Tombstone Stairwell
item.text: Cumulative upkeep {1}{B} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) At the beginning of each upkeep, if Tombstone Stairwell is on the battlefield, each player puts a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with haste named Tombspawn onto the battlefield for each creature card in his or her graveyard. At the beginning of each end step or when Tombstone Stairwell leaves the battlefield, destroy all tokens put onto the battlefield with Tombstone Stairwell. They can't be regenerated.

item.name: Torrent of Lava
item.text: Torrent of Lava deals X damage to each creature without flying. As long as Torrent of Lava is on the stack, each creature has "{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to this creature by Torrent of Lava this turn."
item.flavorText: The mountain's voice shouts us all down.

item.name: Tranquil Domain
item.text: Destroy all non-Aura enchantments.
item.flavorText: "An ancient court mage unified the houses into guilds to serve Zhalfir above their own interests. Even during the civil war, the guilds stood together, a testament to the wisdom of Teferi." —Afari, Tales

item.name: Tropical Storm
item.text: Tropical Storm deals X damage to each creature with flying and 1 additional damage to each blue creature.
item.flavorText: "After the storm, I found a sea turtle dying on the sands, a blade of grass driven through its shell." —Travelogue of Najat

item.name: Uktabi Faerie
item.text: Flying {3}{G}, Sacrifice Uktabi Faerie: Destroy target artifact.
item.flavorText: Victim of the two-toed faerie —Suq'Ata expression meaning "broken"

item.name: Uktabi Wildcats
item.text: Uktabi Wildcats's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests you control. {G}, Sacrifice a Forest: Regenerate Uktabi Wildcats.

item.name: Unerring Sling
item.text: {3}, {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Unerring Sling deals damage equal to the tapped creature's power to target attacking or blocking creature with flying.

item.name: Unfulfilled Desires
item.text: {1}, Pay 1 life: Draw a card, then discard a card.
item.flavorText: "Like Day from Night, / I'll live my life apart from you, just glimpsing you across the sky, / because you cannot change, my dear, and nor can I." —"Love Song of Night and Day"

item.name: Unseen Walker
item.text:
Forestwalk
{1}{G}{G}: Target creature gains forestwalk until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "To pass through the jungle: silence, courtesy, ferocity, as the occasion demands." —Kamau, "Proper Passage"

item.name: Unyaro Bee Sting
item.text: Unyaro Bee Sting deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: "Much can be learned from the bees about dying for a cause." —Asmira, Holy Avenger

item.name: Unyaro Griffin
item.text:
Flying
Sacrifice Unyaro Griffin: Counter target red instant or sorcery spell.
item.flavorText: The griffin's shadow gives courage to the righteous and dread to the idle.

item.name: Urborg Panther
item.text: {B}, Sacrifice Urborg Panther: Destroy target creature blocking Urborg Panther. Sacrifice a creature named Feral Shadow, a creature named Breathstealer, and Urborg Panther: Search your library for a card named Spirit of the Night and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

item.name: Vaporous Djinn
item.text: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, Vaporous Djinn phases out unless you pay {U}{U}. (While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist. It phases in before you untap during your next untap step.)
item.flavorText: "What is taking them so long to fill the waterskins?" —Mwani, Mtenda goatherd

item.name: Ventifact Bottle
item.text: {X}{1}, {T}: Put X charge counters on Ventifact Bottle. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery. At the beginning of your precombat main phase, if Ventifact Bottle has a charge counter on it, tap it and remove all charge counters from it. Add {1} to your mana pool for each charge counter removed this way.

item.name: Viashino Warrior
item.flavorText: "When traveling the Great Desert avoid wearing the scales of lizards, for the Viashino rule the sands and look poorly on the skinning of their cousins." —Zhalfirin Guide to the Desert

item.name: Vigilant Martyr
item.text: Sacrifice Vigilant Martyr: Regenerate target creature. {W}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Vigilant Martyr: Counter target spell that targets an enchantment.

item.name: Village Elder
item.text: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice a Forest: Regenerate target creature.
item.flavorText: "Enchant me with your tale-telling. Tell about Tree, Grass, River, and Wind. / Tell why Truth must fight with Falsehood, and why Truth will always win." —"Love Song of Night and Day"

item.name: Vitalizing Cascade
item.text: You gain X plus 3 life.
item.flavorText: "Water is like breathing—necessary for life." —Asmira, Holy Avenger

item.name: Volcanic Dragon
item.text: Flying, haste
item.flavorText: Speed and fire are always a deadly combination.

item.name: Volcanic Geyser
item.text: Volcanic Geyser deals X damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: My thunder comes before the lightning; my lightning comes before the clouds; my rain dries all the land it touches. What am I? —Femeref riddle

item.name: Waiting in the Weeds
item.text: Each player puts a 1/1 green Cat creature token onto the battlefield for each untapped Forest he or she controls.
item.flavorText: The trees have ears, eyes, and teeth.

item.name: Wall of Corpses
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {B}, Sacrifice Wall of Corpses: Destroy target creature Wall of Corpses is blocking.
item.flavorText: "I shall make walls of their flesh, and their blood will by my mortar." —Kaervek

item.name: Wall of Resistance
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Flying At the beginning of each end step, if Wall of Resistance was dealt damage this turn, put a +0/+1 counter on it.
item.flavorText: Telim'Tor could no longer recall the exact number of assaults—but his troops could.

item.name: Wall of Roots
item.text: Defender Put a -0/-1 counter on Wall of Roots: Add {G} to your mana pool. Activate this ability only once each turn.
item.flavorText: Sometimes the wise ones wove their magic into living plants; as the plant grew, so grew the magic.

item.name: Ward of Lights
item.text: You may cast Ward of Lights as though it had flash. If you cast it any time a sorcery couldn't have been cast, the controller of the permanent it becomes sacrifices it at the beginning of the next cleanup step. Enchant creature As Ward of Lights enters the battlefield, choose a color. Enchanted creature has protection from the chosen color. This effect doesn't remove Ward of Lights.

item.name: Warping Wurm
item.text: Phasing (This phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.) At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {2}{G}{U}. If you don't, Warping Wurm phases out. When Warping Wurm phases in, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
item.flavorText: Even wurms start out small.

item.name: Wave Elemental
item.text: {U}, {T}, Sacrifice Wave Elemental: Tap up to three target creatures without flying.
item.flavorText: "Consider the wave: how weak the mother yet how strong the child." —Tywanna, Shaper Guildmage

item.name: Wellspring
item.text: Enchant land When Wellspring enters the battlefield, gain control of enchanted land until end of turn. At the beginning of your upkeep, untap enchanted land. You gain control of that land until end of turn.

item.name: Wild Elephant
item.text: Trample
item.flavorText: "I will tell my father's stories . . . . How the elephants trampled the leopard cub, and its father, though he knew, killed nine goats instead." —"Love Song of Night and Day"

item.name: Wildfire Emissary
item.text: Protection from white {1}{R}: Wildfire Emissary gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "The efreet is a striding storm with a voice that crackles like fire." —Qhattib, Vizier of Amiqat

item.name: Windreaper Falcon
item.text: Flying, protection from blue
item.flavorText: Watching the windreaper —Zhalfirin phrase meaning "daydreaming"

item.name: Withering Boon
item.text: As an additional cost to cast Withering Boon, pay 3 life. Counter target creature spell.
item.flavorText: "Life for life: this is the immutable law." —Panya, Granger Guildmage

item.name: Worldly Tutor
item.text: Search your library for a creature card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the revealed card back on top of it.
item.flavorText: "Aselbo soon had the rhino eating from his palm and the snake waiting at his heels." —Afari, Tales

item.name: Yare
item.text: Target creature defending player controls gets +3/+0 until end of turn. That creature can block up to two additional creatures this turn.

item.name: Zebra Unicorn
item.text: Whenever Zebra Unicorn deals damage, you gain that much life.
item.flavorText: "I'll capture gentle zebras / for your steeds and fill the stable with every kind of unicorn." —"Love Song of Night and Day"

item.name: Zhalfirin Commander
item.text: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.) {1}{W}{W}: Target Knight creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Command is the act of balancing on a vine and convincing others that it is firm ground." —Sidar Jabari

item.name: Zhalfirin Knight
item.text: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.) {W}{W}: Zhalfirin Knight gains first strike until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "You returned a warrior. . . . Your hair was cut, your eye tattooed with the red triangle of war." —"Love Song of Night and Day"

item.name: Zirilan of the Claw
item.text: {1}{R}{R}, {T}: Search your library for a Dragon permanent card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library. That Dragon gains haste until end of turn. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

item.name: Zombie Mob
item.text: Zombie Mob enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each creature card in your graveyard. When Zombie Mob enters the battlefield, exile all creature cards from your graveyard.

item.name: Zuberi, Golden Feather
item.text: Flying Other Griffin creatures get +1/+1.
item.flavorText: "If the griffins tell of their gods, perhaps they speak of feathers bright as the Sun." —Afari, Tales
